metadata.title: CVE-2020-36478 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Mbed TLS before 2.25.0 (and before 2.16.9 LTSand before 2.7.18 LTS). A NULL algorithm parameters entry looks identicalto an array of REAL (size zero) and thus the certificate is consideredvalid. However, if the parameters do not match in any way, then thecertificate should be considered invalid.

criterions.comment: mbedtls: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
